Name: Falling Slime
About the game: Falling Slime is an arcade stack ’em up that combines matching puzzlers with Falling Sand style games. Linking four or more slimes of one color causes them to ‘pop’ into particles of various ‘elements’, which then fall below the slime line. The player must balance setting up combos of matches with keeping the sandbox clear via the interaction of the elemental particles. If either the sandbox or slimebox get filled, it’s game over! Key Features Stack ‘em up meets Falling Sand! Multiple Arcade Modes Play vs. AI or a local opponent Endless single-player mode: Try to best your high score! Adorable, marketable slimes!
